vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with McKool Smith, P.C., Ashcroft Sutton Reyes LLC, and Korein Tillery LLC for legal services to represent the City of Dallas in the lawsuit to be filed and styled City of Dallas et al. v. Netlix, Inc., et al., contingent upon approval of the contract by the Office of the Attorney General of Texas pursuant to Section 2254 of the Texas Government Code - Financing:  No cost consideration (see Fiscal Information)
